vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀγεν-ής, ές,
(γενέσθαι) unborn, uncreated, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II of no family, ignoble, opposed to ἀγαθός, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of things, οὐκ ἀγενεῖς στίχοι [Refs 8th c.BC+]
__III childless, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: lowly, insignificant, implying low social standing
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
lowly, insignificant, implying low social standing
literally, without kin; figuratively, base, low, insignificant 1Cor. 1:28*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 身世平凡,低下,卑微(林前 1:28)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 身世平凡,低下,卑微(林前 1:28)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: hèn hạ; không đáng kể; đáng khinh
